 Lunarpine took a quick look at the stasis pods, Ramhorn wasn't any 
longer in one. That was a good sign. Someone with some common sense 
running things instead of Ramulus. "Now there's hope for this war."
he thought as he looked at the nearly empty sickbay.

 

At the Predaconcave Phobia stirred wondering how he could change this 
war. "First thing I must do to save the timeline is gain the trust of 
the Predacons, Megatron won't listen so I'll have to find a pawn with 
some charisma to take over." The big question on his mind was how to 
get them away from Megatron long enough to show them the evidence 
he'd collected.
